Q_NAME: Print Student Details by invoking methods in Student Class.
Q_DESC:
Mandatory
1.Create a new class named "Student" apart from the main class (TestClass) 

2.Create a method named insert to get the details of the student with two arguments of integer and string type respectively.
void insert(int r, String n)

3.Create a method named "display" to display the details of the student with no arguments
void display()
